attributes.action: Petition to return the Army Commando dagger back onto working dress!
attributes.additional_details: The Airborne forces have recently returned their Pegasus and I believe it has restored a great pride within there ranks. I strongly believe the return of the dagger to Commando forces will do the same!
attributes.background: I am a serving Army Commando and wish to wear my army commando dagger back on our working uniform.
